## Plotly graph

```{r, include = FALSE}
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
p <- plot_ly(data = iris, x = ~Sepal.Length, y = ~Petal.Length,
             mode = "markers", type = "scatter", color = ~Species,
        marker = list(size = ~Sepal.Length)) 

p
```
